articles.description: One of the largest owners of childcare facilities in the country has revealed it has underpaid as many as 27,000 workers as much as $80 million over six years.
articles.content: G8 said a preliminary assessment indicated it had underpaid its workers between $50 million and $80 million since July 1, 2014. It said it expects the after-tax cost to be between $30 million and $60… [+2873 chars]
